meta.title: Google Summer of Code 2018
meta.summary: It's this time of year again! Google Summer of Code 2018 submission period has just started!

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x metrics now with Micrometer.io
meta.summary: The new vertx-micrometer-metrics module provides support for collecting metrics with Micrometer.io and storing them in backends such as Graphite or InfluxDB.

meta.title: Unit and Integration Tests
meta.summary: Let’s refresh our mind about what we developed so far in the introduction to vert.x series. We forgot an important task. We didn’t test the API.

meta.title: Some Rest with Vert.x
meta.summary: This post is part of the Introduction to Vert.x series. Let’s go a bit further this time and develop a CRUD-ish application

meta.title: My first Vert.x 3 Application
meta.summary: Let's say, you heard someone saying that Vert.x is awesome. Ok great, but you may want to try it by yourself. Well, the next natural question is “where do I start ?”
